Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: A $(this.appearance:symbol:right-breast:adjective) $(this.appearance:right-breast:adjective) $(this.appearance:breasts) right breast covered in $(this.appearance:fur:adjective) $(this.appearance:furcolor) fur. $(this.appearance:symbol:right-breast) {? | $(this.combat:injury:right-breast) |It has $(this.combat:injury:right-breast).}

A set of $(this.appearance:eyelashes) eyelashes over a right eye.

{? | $(this.declawed) | Where you would expect to see $(this.appearance:clawtype) you notice instead that they have been messily removed from the fingers. | A set of five $(this.appearance:clawlength) $(this.appearance:clawapp) right $(this.appearance:clawtype). }
A set of $(this.appearance:right-fingers) right fingers. $(this.appearance:symbol:right-fingers) {? | $(this.combat:injury:right-fingers) |They have $(this.combat:injury:right-fingers).}

A set of $(this.appearance:right-fingertips) right fingertips. $(this.appearance:symbol:right-fingertips) {? | $(this.combat:injury:right-fingertips) |They have $(this.combat:injury:right-fingertips).}

{? equal | $(this.appearance:hands) | ordinary |A $(this.appearance:right-hand) right hand.|A $(this.appearance:right-hand:adjective) $(this.appearance:hands) right hand.} $(this.appearance:symbol:right-hand) {? | $(this.combat:injury:right-hand) |It has $(this.combat:injury:right-hand).} {? | $(this.declawed) | The nails on this hand have been messily removed. }

A $(this.appearance:right-index-fingernail:adjective) $(this.appearance:index-fingernail) fingernail, at the end of a right index finger. $(this.appearance:symbol:right-index-fingernail) {? | $(this.combat:injury:right-index-fingernail) |It has $(this.combat:injury:right-index-fingernail).}
A $(this.appearance:right-knuckles) set of right knuckles. $(this.appearance:symbol:right-knuckles) {? | $(this.combat:injury:right-knuckles) |They have $(this.combat:injury:right-knuckles).}

A $(this.appearance:right-middle-fingernail:adjective) $(this.appearance:middle-fingernail) fingernail, at the end of a right middle finger. $(this.appearance:symbol:right-middle-fingernail) {? | $(this.combat:injury:right-middle-fingernail) |It has $(this.combat:injury:right-middle-fingernail).}
The $(this.appearance:right-pinky) little finger on a right hand. $(this.appearance:symbol:right-pinky) {? | $(this.combat:injury:right-pinky) |It has $(this.combat:injury:right-pinky).}

A $(this.appearance:right-pinky-fingernail:adjective) $(this.appearance:pinky-fingernail) fingernail, at the end of a right pinky finger. $(this.appearance:symbol:right-pinky-fingernail) {? | $(this.combat:injury:right-pinky-fingernail) |It has $(this.combat:injury:right-pinky-fingernail).}
A pupil of the right eye.

A $(this.appearance:right-ring-fingernail:adjective) $(this.appearance:ring-fingernail) fingernail, at the end of a right ring finger. $(this.appearance:symbol:right-ring-fingernail) {? | $(this.combat:injury:right-ring-fingernail) |It has $(this.combat:injury:right-ring-fingernail).}

The triangular bone across the upper right back of the body, connected to the collarbone. $(this.appearance:symbol:right-shoulderblade) {? | $(this.combat:injury:right-shoulderblade) |It has $(this.combat:injury:right-shoulderblade).}

The $(this.appearance:right-side) right side, between the right ribs and the right waist. $(this.appearance:symbol:right-side) {? | $(this.combat:injury:right-side) |It has $(this.combat:injury:right-side).}
The $(this.appearance:right-sole) sole of a right foot. $(this.appearance:symbol:right-sole) {? | $(this.combat:injury:right-sole) |It has $(this.combat:injury:right-sole).}
